Author: tofu_snob
Text: Shoot me a message if you want to talk. You have to really be able to separate your disorder from your love of nutrition. The technical career path is called being a registered dietitian nutritionist because anyone can call themselves a "nutritionist" because its not a protected term. Its a very competitive field which can make it hard to get the RDN credential, but I'll be one in the next year because I was fortunate enough to make it into an internship.
